20110119150410.000|20110119150413.000|CC1|SURVEILLANCE VIDEO THAT CAPTURED

20110119150416.000|20110119150418.000|CC1|SAFEWAY SURVEILLANCE TAPE       
20110119150418.000|20110119150420.000|CC1|ALLEGEDLY SHOWS JARED LOUGHNER  
20110119150420.000|20110119150423.000|CC1|WALKING INTO THE PICTURE AT     
20110119150423.000|20110119150424.000|CC1|10:10:00 A.M.                   
20110119150424.000|20110119150424.000|CC1|HE MOVES AROUND THE TABLE.      
20110119150424.000|20110119150428.000|CC1|AND SHOOTS CONGRESSWOMAN        
20110119150428.000|20110119150429.000|CC1|GIFFORDS IN HER LEFT FOREHEAD   
20110119150429.000|20110119150431.000|CC1|JUST ABOVE HER EYE.             
20110119150431.000|20110119150432.000|CC1|AT THE TIME THE SHOT IS FIRED,  
20110119150432.000|20110119150432.000|CC1|LOUGHNER IS THREE FEET FROM     
20110119150432.000|20110119150433.000|CC1|GIFFORDS.                       
20110119150433.000|20110119150434.000|CC1|THEN, ACCORDING TO THE OFFICIALS
20110119150434.000|20110119150435.000|CC1|THAT HAVE SEEN THE VIDEO,       
20110119150435.000|20110119150436.000|CC1|LOUGHNER TURNS TO HIS LEFT,     
20110119150436.000|20110119150437.000|CC1|FACING THE CROWD.               
20110119150437.000|20110119150441.000|CC1|AND THE SHOOTING CONTINUES.     
20110119150441.000|20110119150443.000|CC1|FOOTAGE ALLEGEDLY YOU SHOWS     
20110119150443.000|20110119150445.000|CC1|MUZZLE FLASHES AS THE GUN IS    
20110119150445.000|20110119150446.000|CC1|FIRED.                          
20110119150446.000|20110119150447.000|CC1|>> WE HAVE AT LEAST SEVEN,      
20110119150447.000|20110119150447.000|CC1|EIGHT.                          
20110119150447.000|20110119150448.000|CC1|MAYBE TEN GUNSHOT VICTIMS.      
20110119150448.000|20110119150449.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THEN, AN ACT OF    
20110119150449.000|20110119150450.000|CC1|HEROISM, CAPTURED ON VIDEO.     
20110119150450.000|20110119150456.000|CC1|THE SUSPECT SHOOTS RON BARBER.  
20110119150456.000|20110119150457.000|CC1|FEDERAL DISTRICT JUDGE JOHN ROLL
20110119150457.000|20110119150458.000|CC1|TRIES TO HELP BARBER.           
20110119150458.000|20110119150459.000|CC1|BARBER SURVIVED.                
20110119150459.000|20110119150500.000|CC1|ROLL DID NOT.                   
20110119150500.000|20110119150501.000|CC1|IN ALL, INVESTIGATORS SAY       
20110119150501.000|20110119150505.000|CC1|LOUGHNER FIRED 32 ROUNDS BEFORE 
20110119150505.000|20110119150507.000|CC1|HE WAS TACKLED BY PARTICIPANTS  
20110119150507.000|20110119150511.000|CC1|AT GIFFORDS' EVENT.             
20110119150511.000|20110119150512.000|CC1|>> I RAN OVER TO HIM.

20110119150513.000|20110119150513.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:05:00 of 2:00:00
20110119150513.000|20110119150515.000|CC1|IN HIS BACK.

20110119150518.000|20110119150519.000|CC1|THERE.

20110119150523.000|20110119150524.000|CC1|HE DID NOT STRUGGLE WITH US AT  
20110119150524.000|20110119150526.000|CC1|ALL.                            
20110119150526.000|20110119150526.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE TAPE MAY       
20110119150526.000|20110119150527.000|CC1|PROVIDE ADDITIONAL EVIDENCE THAT
20110119150527.000|20110119150528.000|CC1|THE ASSAULT WAS PREMEDITATED.   
20110119150528.000|20110119150529.000|CC1|LOUGHNER REPORTEDLY HAD EAR     
20110119150529.000|20110119150530.000|CC1|PLUGS.                          
20110119150530.000|20110119150532.000|CC1|AND WAS SEEN ON TAPE, TALKING   
20110119150532.000|20110119150533.000|CC1|CALMLY TO A SAFEWAY CLERK IN THE
20110119150533.000|20110119150534.000|CC1|MOMENTS BEFORE THE SHOOTING.    
20110119150534.000|20110119150535.000|CC1|SOURCES SAY LOUGHNER'S PARENTS, 
20110119150535.000|20110119150537.000|CC1|SEEN HERE AT THEIR HOME ON      
20110119150537.000|20110119150538.000|CC1|TUESDAY, HAVE COOPERATED WITH   
20110119150538.000|20110119150540.000|CC1|THE INVESTIGATION.              
20110119150540.000|20110119150541.000|CC1|AND APPARENTLY HAD NO IDEA WHAT 
20110119150541.000|20110119150544.000|CC1|THEIR SON HAD BEEN PLANNING.    
20110119150544.000|20110119150545.000|CC1|THESE TAPES ARE DESCRIBED AS    
20110119150545.000|20110119150547.000|CC1|PAINFUL TO WATCH.               
20110119150547.000|20110119150548.000|CC1|BUT DON'T EXPECT TO BE SEEING   
20110119150548.000|20110119150549.000|CC1|THEM ANYTIME SOON.

20110119151858.000|20110119151859.000|CC1|SARGENT SHRIVER PASSED AWAY     
20110119151859.000|20110119151901.000|CC1|TUESDAY.                        
20110119151901.000|20110119151904.000|CC1|THE BUSINESSMAN, BROTHER-IN-LAW 
20110119151904.000|20110119151906.000|CC1|OF PRESIDENT JOHN F. KENNEDY    
20110119151906.000|20110119151907.000|CC1|BECAME THE FIRST DIRECTOR OF THE
20110119151907.000|20110119151909.000|CC1|PEACE CORPS.                    
20110119151909.000|20110119151910.000|CC1|HE FOUNDED THE SPECIAL OLYMPICS 
20110119151910.000|20110119151910.000|CC1|WITH HIS WIFE, EUNICE.          
20110119151910.000|20110119151911.000|CC1|AND A LIFE THAT SPANNED NEARLY A
20110119151911.000|20110119151912.000|CC1|CENTURY, HIS GOOD WORKS CHANGED 
20110119151912.000|20110119151916.000|CC1|MILLIONS OF LIVES.              
20110119151916.000|20110119151921.000|CC1|>> SARGENT SHRIVER WAS AN       
20110119151921.000|20110119151923.000|CC1|OPTIMISTIC PUBLIC SERVANT.      
20110119151923.000|20110119151923.000|CC1|SHARP, WITTY.                   
20110119151923.000|20110119151924.000|CC1|A WALKING ENCYCLOPEDIA.         
20110119151924.000|20110119151925.000|CC1|HIS MIND, A BEAUTIFULLY-TUNED   
20110119151925.000|20110119151926.000|CC1|INSTRUMENT, THAT LEFT PEOPLE IN 
20110119151926.000|20110119151927.000|CC1|AWE.                            
20110119151927.000|20110119151928.000|CC1|FOR MANY YEARS, MY FATHER,      
20110119151928.000|20110119151929.000|CC1|SARGENT SHRIVER, WOULD COME HERE
20110119151929.000|20110119151931.000|CC1|TO THE HILL HIMSELF, TO TESTIFY 
20110119151931.000|20110119151933.000|CC1|BEFORE COMMITTEES LIKE THIS.    
20110119151933.000|20110119151935.000|CC1|HE CAME TO GET INCREASED FUNDING

20110119153653.000|20110119153654.000|CC1|HOW DO YOU GO ABOUT DETERMINING 
20110119153654.000|20110119153656.000|CC1|THAT?                           
20110119153656.000|20110119153657.000|CC1|>> YOU KNOW, WE WONDER IF IT'S A
